QuestData.Title: Pure Evil
QuestData.Description: We know that Kolramas, the crashed necropolis to the southeast, was carrying a large amount of an ore known as saronite when the trolls shot it down.$B$BMy scouts tell me that much of the saronite is strewn about within the innards of that thing.$B$BEitrigg and his friends back at The Argent Stand want a bunch of the stuff so that they can study it.$B$BI want you to head in there and see if you can collect enough for them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Rupert has asked you to collect 10 Chunks of Saronite and deliver them to Eitrigg at The Argent Stand.
QuestData.CompletionText: Yes, $c?$B$BPlease tell me that you have the saronite that we requested Captain Rupert to acquire?
QuestData.RewardText: Can you not feel the pure evil of the stuff?$B$BWe must use the expertise and magics at our disposal, combined with the power of the Holy Light, to pierce the veil of iniquity surrounding this tainted ore. We must determine its origins.$B$BQuickly, hand the saronite to me!
